Money Transfer

Easiest way to transfer cash to anyone

A simple and highly secure direct money transfer ability for your customers using cash with industry-leading success rates

Try for free





Money Transfer

Instant money transfer, anytime & anywhere


Ekoâ€™s remittance service gives you the feature to turn your own shop into a bank. Customers who do not have bank accounts but still want to transfer money using cash can visit your shop. You can take the cash and transfer digital money to the bank account specified by them. Easy and effective!



Easy Cash transfer

Customers can transfer cash to anyone by specifying their bank details right at your doorstep

Transaction-assurance

Assure your customers that their money is safe using our transaction assurance option

Transaction receipt

Print transaction-receipt for your customers to give them a sense of safety



Benefits



Earn Commission

Earn commission for every cash-deposit, cash-withdrawal or balance-inquiry that your customer does at your shop. More transaction is more commission for you.



Best Success Rate

Transaction failures occur rarely with our services. We ensure that you get the best success rate for every transaction. We are as reliable as banks themselves





Turn your shop into a mini bank

Since money transfer is the most commonly used banking service, this feature will turn your shop into a mini bank for customers! Consequently, more customers will visit your shop





Avoid Bank Queues

Customers would no longer need to stand in queues for banking services. They can simply visit your shop and use these services.



Save Travel Money

Customers can save time and money by not having to travel to bank branches. They can use all these basic banking services at your shop.





Eko's Trust

You can assure your customers that their money and data is safe. Ekoâ€™s trust is unparalleled



How money transfer works

Step 1:

Sign Up on Connect

https://connect.eko.in/

Step 2:

Enter customer mobile number

Step 3:

Enter amount and bank details

Step 4:

Click send and collect cash



A customer who wishes to use your service would simply need to provide his mobile number and details of the bank account to transfer money to.


For all issues, we provide 24x7 support.
